attributes.action: pledge money to Avro Vulcan XH558 to keep it airworthy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Avro Vulcan XH558 is the world's only airworthy "V-Bomber". It has been lovingly restored as a gift to the nation and is currently in a dangerous financial state. It requires £50,000 a month to stay airborne and that target may be hard to meet. Please pledge the money as this national icon surely can't fall into bankruptcy.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
